website_summaries.verdict: Verilux is a known brand, and this model provides light that's as effective yet less pricey than some high-end competitors.
pros: Delivers therapeutic white light with customizable settings in a model that falls in the middle of the price spectrum
Size is fairly compact, yet light is bright
Sleek design with a spacious light surface
cons: Rare faulty units have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Not 10,000 lux at any useful distance
customer_reviews.text: Strap it to your face and you'll get 10,000 lux. Otherwise, my light meter shows less than 1000 at any normal distance (like sitting in a chair with it on a table or desk). Bought an Aurora Lightpad Mini instead.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT light! I have never had a HappyLight before
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT light! I have never had a HappyLight before, and this is really a game changer! I live in NYC where it feels like it is gray all the time, and in the past I have certainly felt the effects. This season I noticed that my energy never lagged and I was still able to hop out of bed even though it was dark. I use it for about 30 minutes per day while eating an early breakfast and it keeps me going all day! I cannot say enough good things about this light. Also it is small enough to be portable which is very convenient, it would fit anywhere in my apartment. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seasonal Affective Disorder!
customer_reviews.text: The long New England winters make the Verilux HappyLight a must! Using it for about half an hour each morning while checking my emails and having my morning coffee has made a huge difference in my mood. The lack of sun during this extremely long winter had me feeling down and unmotivated. It’s amazing how bright this small light is and I love that it is portable; very easy to pack and take to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Cali C.

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: I had been reading everywhere about light therapy for seasonal affective disorder and spring felt like it was taking forever to get here, so I decided to pull the trigger on getting the HappyLight Lucent. No regrets. I have used it everyday since I got it and I totally feel the difference!! I don’t feel as rundown, I have slept better and feel way more focused. The light is the only change I’ve made. People have actually asked me why I’m so happy lately!! It’s cool. Wasn’t a sold believer in light therapy before I bought one. 100 percent am a believer now.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel acosta

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, and energizing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this light! I use it in the morning and I feel energized throughout the day. It has been especially beneficial during this extended cold snap we have had in New England - all the way into May this year. It is the size of a tablet so it is sleek, fits anywhere, and would be great to pack when traveling. The stand is sturdy and can be detached and clipped to the back - another added bonus for packing/storing. I can't recommend this light enough!
customer_reviews.author: trish marie

customer_reviews.title: I am a believer! The HappyLight works!
customer_reviews.text: I love my HappyLight! It's made such a difference for me! I have it on my desk and use it everyday. I have noticed over the past month, my energy levels are higher, I am more focussed and my sleep patterns have never been this great! I wake up at the same time in the morning (give or take 5-10) which has been a blessing. The size and sleekness is also such a plus and isn't hideous like a lot of other light boxes. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica iriarte

customer_reviews.title: on switch
customer_reviews.text: I noticed several reviews that mentioned problems with the on/off switch. I found the same problem. Also the cord is short, and the location (in the middle on the back) makes it difficult to position. The stand doesn't help either. The actual intensity of the lamp is questionable. I like to ride my bicycle at night, and I have two 1000 lumen lights mounted to the handle bars. people have told me they mistook me for a car. That would never happen with this "happy light." The only thing happy about this light is the cha-ching of the cash register at Verilux.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The power button/power cord started malfunctioning a few days after receiving this product. They offer a 30 day limited warranty with a HUGE process you have to go through to even qualify to return it. Mine completely stopped working after about a month and a half. I only used it while sitting at home. It did not go through heavy wear and tear, if any at all. I reccomend steering clear of this brand completely. Would give zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Electric problems stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this light but after two days the power would stay on for more than a minute or two. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Must have for seasonal depression
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how well this works. I started using it three weeks ago during the change of seasons when I started feeling my depression creep in. I use it 30 min a day in the morning. If I don’t have time, I put it on in the bathroom while I’m getting ready. My depression is gone. I wish I had started using this years ago. Just a heads up it arrived in a brown box from the manufacturer that says “Happy Light” all over it. No amazon box. So if you’re having it delivered somewhere like work it’s not discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Might want to purchase a light that comes with a better stand.
customer_reviews.text: The light arrived today and the light is great,however, the stand provided is terrible. Barely touched it to change the placement and it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brown

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this Happy Light
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Happy Light. I absolutely love this light. I use this in work at my desk. This light makes me feel like the sun is shining bright in the office. The only downfall is it may be a bit too bright. Maybe adding a dimmer switch would help. Love the size and portability. You can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: michele whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, problem is..it wouldn’t turn on after the first day. For $45 I would expect it to last longer than that! I will be returning this today. Go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Problem with Socket Adapter for AC Power Cord Connection
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product due to the AC power adapter pin breaking in the connector piece. The pin never plugged in easily and a week after having the light, the pin broke in the socket and rendered the light not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Breton Dearborn

customer_reviews.title: Detailed use instructions
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friend live in Seattle, where it rains and is gloomy at least 9 months of the year. Both of them said a few things where I thought they might be suffering from lack of sunlight (SADS). Not even a day after getting these lamps, my daughter said she is feeling better. Maybe it's that someone cared, but I think it is the lamp. This product description had very good instructions. And, the cat sits in front of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lollypop

customer_reviews.title: Good design!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this HappyLight and the product itself is great. Packaged great, good quality, simple basic design, easy to start using. Stand is just fine. Was unsure which therapy Lamp to chose and I wrote a couple different companies with a question. Verilux thoughtfully responded and answered all my questions while the other company never even responded. So far happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great- gave me a raging migrane
customer_reviews.text: I rarely get headaches. Used as per the instructions (and light therapy best-practices) and got a RAGING headache. I told someone I was worried I "broke my brain." The next session, I pointed the light at the wall, again only 20 of exposure, and got another raging migrane. It lasted about 24 hours, and I feel I'm more sensitive to the sunlight than I was before... Haven't tried using it again, but I'd really like this therapy to work for me, so I'm going to investigate putting it in another room, or in the far corner of the room.... we shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this light for a week now. I believe it is really helping me! I feel more energized and in overall better spirits. I live in Kentucky and we have had a lot of rain this year. Our winters consist of days on end of gray skies. So I think this has been a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina P.

customer_reviews.title: This Thing is Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had seasonal affective disorder for years, and the Happy Light has honestly been the most effective fix that I've ever used. I turn it on and put it close by in the evening whenever I'm studying or just watching Netflix, and it makes me feel much better than anything else I've tried (exercise, being outside more, taking Vitamin D, taking St. John's wort). I just wish I had found this years ago, it would have saved me a lot of misery. Would absolutely recommend to anyone dealing with seasonal depression.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Case

customer_reviews.title: Was not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: It is kind of a pain to use, however I feel like any light would be the same. The real reason I didn’t give better rating is that we could see no improvement from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: The light was perfect but it was for a 85 year old and ...
customer_reviews.text: The light was perfect but it was for a 85 year old and didn't really understand how to use it, so we did return it, but it was great for someone looking for 'daylight'.
customer_reviews.author: Beth G

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning while drinking coffee in bed. I find that it gives me a couple hours of energy that I haven’t had otherwise. I’d give it 5 stars if: (1) The on/off switch was easier to operate. It takes concentrated effort to push down. (2) it could stand up without requiring so much depth behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Cork

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my HappyLight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my HappyLight! It is the perfect size to bring with me when I travel. It really helps to brighten my mood when I’m feeling a bit down. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for support brace
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product. I was excited to see that it was very bright. Some of the reviews seem to indicate that it was not bright enough. I did not find that to be the case! However, when I was putting the support brace on the light it broke. The support brace broke the first time it was being attached to the light! I believe they could have designed it a little better so that this would not occur! I'm frustrated because now the light will not stand on its own! As to whether or not the light is going to work for my SAD condition I don't know yet it is too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: T. V. Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Did not work more than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working 3 weeks after the return period expired.
customer_reviews.author: William Baca

customer_reviews.title: Quite helpful on drab days.
customer_reviews.text: Someone suggested a daytime light lamp to me years ago to help deal with my low moods in the winter especially in the morning. And as long as I use it as soon as I wake up it changes the outcome of my day. I've got energy, I'm more up beat, and as long as I imagine I'm in a park on a sunny day it lifts me up. But the way I use it isn't exactly correct as I close my eyes and put it right in front of my face to get the brightness right so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Easy to use. Great value for your money. Transports easily.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I hate about this light! The product is so very light. It weighs less than a paper back book. I HIGHLY recommend this EASY to use product. It take up literally no room. SO VERY BRIGHT! It is smaller than my iPad. [In comparison I own the Day-Light Classic Bright Lamp 10,000 lux. While this light is effective, it is way too big and bulky. I Had nowhere to use it.] Buy this product. Used 1 day so far and I am actually excited for fall for a change!
customer_reviews.author: olliemommie

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beyond bright! It doesn’t get hot to the touch, but I swear I can feel the warmth on my skin. It’s super bright, klightweight, portable (not wireless), and reasonably priced. This is my second Verilux product; I trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase if you have limited sun!
customer_reviews.text: Waited to review until used for the first month of winter. This is a MUST PURCHASE. In Ohio, there is not a lot of sun during the winter months - I click this on in my office around 4-430 when it starts to get darker and helps me get through the remaining time at work. Have also used in the mornings as well if feeling sluggish. Light enough and small enough to throw in my bag to take from home to work. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This light is 10,000 lux at 6 inches away. If you are setting it on a desk, it is near impossible to be this close to the light. It is ineffective for SAD If you aren’t getting the correct dose of light. You need to use this device for several hours to feel the effects.
customer_reviews.author: PA Mom

customer_reviews.title: A blessing ! Extremely effective, safe for those with bipolar disorder with recommended dose.
customer_reviews.text: This product changed my life. My therapist recommended a mood light as I experience seasonal depression. I also have bipolar disorder. I use it every workday for 30 minutes. I noticed mood improvements within 2 days. Be careful! I used more than was recommended at first and I had to go down to 30 minutes a day because it was causing manic symptoms. Have not had any problems since going to a proper daily dose. I am so happy to have found something safe and natural to treat my depression. This thing is a blessing !
customer_reviews.author: EspritLyrique

customer_reviews.title: Small bit VERY bright happy light
customer_reviews.text: Happy lite is blindingly bright. I don't like it but my husband loves it. I wish I would have purchase the light with different light options. This one is eirher on or off. No variables, so it can't be used as a mood light, night light only a happy light. Smaller than what I expected but if it were bigger it would light up my neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: nnairol

customer_reviews.title: The stand is too short, not made well and broke q
customer_reviews.text: I like the light, the size is perfect for my busy travel schedule. I am giving only three stars because of the stand. It broke on me within the first two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy MattesonZicafoose

customer_reviews.text: The light is very nice. I was using it in the mornings when eating breakfast, but I've found using it at night at a farther distance is better. It's very very bright, so if you're prone to migraines, headaches, and light sensitivity I wouldn't really recommend this product. The light does not get very hot or warm after 10-20 minutes of use. It's just barely warm on the front, but otherwise you can handle it without waiting for it to cool down after use. I would highly recommend giving this product a try if you suffer from SAD. It's very helpful ! You'll need to figure out how long of exposure works best for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work, Don't Waste Your Time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a nursing project and I took out out of the package and it wouldn't turn on. Unreliable. You would be better off with a different model/brand.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: This light has made a big difference in my general mood and wellbeing. I use it for about 30 minutes every morning while I make breakfast and pack lunches for my kids. I can't say my sleep has been any better, but my energy levels have been more consistent and I'm happy with it. The only reason I can't give 5 stars is because my button for the power is a bit tricky and doesnt always turn on right away. You have to press it just right to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: NLMickey0419

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say...
customer_reviews.text: It is real bright but I didn't notice anything after using for a week and a half. I even sat real close (advice from other reviews) and could really tell it was bright but no noticable change in my mild winter blues. This is the first time I have tried light therapy so take it as you may. Now I use it as a normal light since it's real bright and extreamly energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: NICKER-PECKER

customer_reviews.title: How is everyone not blind?
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I was led to believe that there were settings for brightness on this. There is one setting and that is blinding. I honestly have no clue how people would sit in front of this. This is blinding. If you get headaches/migraines, avoid this at all costs. Even my kids were like whoa!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Markey

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: You need a big enough space to set this up in. It is very bright. You aren't supposed to look directly at it. Where I have mind, my right eye gets more of the light than my left eye. Sometimes, my right eye bothers me a little in the morning when I am using the light. I think it's helping with my mood a little.
customer_reviews.author: laura42

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a stand
customer_reviews.text: I thought that when you buy a light like this that it would come with a stand not a small circle clip...to attach to what? I will be returning this item ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great SAAD lamp at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily in upstate NY where we have very very grey winters. My mood takes a nosedive around October, but this has kept me going and I noticed an immediate improvement when I first started using it. My only complaint is that the cord sticks straight out the back, which limits how you can use it (I couldn’t use it on my treadmill stand, for example, but ended up figuring out a way to sort of make it work). The stand is fine for basic desk work, but annoying if you use it in bed or on an uneven surface. Overall though I love this thing and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Good light and good design except for the stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a good light that works and helps to keep SAD at bay. However the stand is not well thought through and does not always stand well. A simple push will cause it to tumble due to the small angle that it has against the table. I wish there was something like an ipad stand where it would be more well propped up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinely552

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for depression and sleep issues
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Only criticism is that the stand in its most upright position tips forward, so depending on whether you put the stand on the long or short side of the rectangle, it needs to be at quite an angle to balance correctly. Have been using this for 30 minutes upon waking every day and my circadian rhythm are back appropriately, sleeping better, depression lifted!
customer_reviews.author: movielover

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Trying to combat the upcoming Maine winter blues. Some photos show the light face with the bulbs visible but that is not what it looks like. Light is bright and even through a flat panel. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Stand breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: It's really really bright. I have a hard time using it because I can't get used to how bright it is. I did want to purchase one of the brightest ones they had, but this one is very bright. The stand is this small plastic clip and it broke with only a few uses. I cant prop it up with anything else it seems. The warrenty didnt cover that part and to buy a new one is $9.95 + $6 in shipping. The power cord is not that long either.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant light
customer_reviews.text: I don't shine this HappyLight in my face as it's too bright for me, but I have been using it in place of my lamp above my desk and love it. It is way more brilliant than both the ceiling light fixture and the lamp, which helps me focus longer in the evening and on dreary days. In the picture, you can see how much extra light it provides in addition to the ceiling fixture. Very helpful for productively, awakeness/alertness, and overall mood.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: helps with SAD
customer_reviews.text: In the winter, I try to sit with this for 15 minutes a couple of times a week. It's so much nicer than the bulky one I used to have-- it was huge. This one is more iPad sized. The only thing that would make it any better is if you could charge it and take it places. This one has to be plugged in while you're using it, so you're sort of tethered to one place. But other than that, it's awesome. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Mace

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.text: Brighter than the video lets on but I can tell a big difference already in my mood and energy. Started off shorter on the exposure time because it can tire your eyes in a confined space (I have it in my office cubicle) so definitely build up your time accordingly. Definitely helping me get through the DST down mood. Only negative is that I can’t hang it on my wall. I’ll have to fashion a holder for it because I don’t prefer to have it sitting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: brittany elrod

customer_reviews.title: Good size & bright, however not great stand
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I am recovering from surgery so my time outside is limited. I have used a much bigger light, but it was incredibly inconvenient. This however is much more user friendly. My reason for not giving it 5 stars is the stand that attaches does not work well. I am setting it in my lap and that's working for me for now. This is slightly thicker than a tablet. I know SADS light work, and I look forward to this helping.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Feels like Vacation
customer_reviews.text: I love to do my morning stretches on my yoga mat with this light beside me. It makes me feel almost like it's spring or summer at any time of the year! My moods do seem to have improved a bit since I started using this light. I wasn't exactly "depressed" before, but I think I was catching a case of winter blues or cabin fever. The cat loves it, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christal Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: While this product does deliver a good deal of light, it is harsh on the eyes. I had to face it away from me which diminishes the efficacy. It defeats he purpose! The stand is very flimsy and the product falls over at the slightest touch. It is durable and doesn’t get damaged when it falls. Overall it’s ok, but I would have to say....meh.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Wakes me up in the morning and keeps me awake in the afternoons
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this by my psychiatrist when we were discussing my issues waking up / staying awake in the afternoons. I turn this guy on first thing in the morning when I have my coffee and in the afternoons when that post-lunch nap starts to sound really tempting. This light works better than anything short of physical exercise for giving me energy. I literally feel myself waking up as soon as I turn it on. Also, this thing is laughably bright. It's like a mini sun. Very simple to use, one button, comes with a one piece kickstand. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January, used it till March and was doing well with it. I put it a way during the summer and now that September came, I took it out of the box and pluged it in, and it is dead. There is no charging or buttonns. I tried it in all my house outlets. It is dead. I am going to contact the seller, since it has 3 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I purchased it for my child who has delt with depression. This is great for the winter months and even when he doesn't go out as much as he should during the warmer months. I find him using it without being told to do so. It is very bright so if a child will be using it teach them to not look into it.
customer_reviews.author: unicornpuke528

customer_reviews.title: Does it really work?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how to measure the effectiveness of this light. We live in the cloudy, dark Northwest and this light does make me feel good. I would like to have it on a lot more than recommended, but resist. It seems to be well made and you can move it easily as you desire. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette love

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light. Perfect size for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light due to its smaller size. It's about the size of an iPad tablet. My other light box is larger and just a bit cumbersome to travel with. I travel for work 30 to 60%. This little light is bright, a great size and cools down quickly (which is important if you need to pack and go). When I'm not traveling, I use it on my desk as a second light box. I'd definitely recommend for anyone who suffers with Seasonal Affective Disorder. I use it October through March.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R.

customer_reviews.title: More Light
customer_reviews.text: I work night shift and I feel more awake with this on before work. I feel less of a need to take a nap before work. I can't say my personal mood has been improved, but I feel awake now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This light has done wonders for my sons seasonal affective disorder. I highly recommend this to anyone suffering from winter depression.
customer_reviews.author: yurt dweller

customer_reviews.title: Very bright , only one setting, pretty cool, only keep on for 30min- 1 hr
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish this was a bit cheaper, I have to say that my happy light brings me mega power and light when the days are cold, gloomy and uncreative. Not bad to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: Smart_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I use them in the morning after my alarm goes off . I bought 2 and use them at the same time. I have had that seasonal thing with the short days for years, this year with the lights is incredibly better, believe it or not. My day starts off happy,
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great value - effective and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and I use this light several days of the week. It has helped to reset our circadian rhythms, which is why I bought it. I’ve also found that it makes me more alert in the mornings and increases my energy levels throughout the day. I don’t use it for more than 10 minutes most days, and have had to be careful because it has caused me to feel hyperactive if I have the light on for too long. But that’s on me. Overall great quality product at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: S.A.D. no more
customer_reviews.text: Even living in New Mexico where we have mostly sunny days, I've had bouts of SAD during the winter when the days are shorter ... this HappyLight has been a real game changer for me. I only need to use it on overcast days (and it seems like we've had many more this year) but it has helped me get the boost I need to get on with things I need to do.
customer_reviews.author: abqsue

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Verilux Happy Light for one week (30 mins in the morning, when I have breakfast) - I can say that I perceive some beneficial effects already! I feel that my brain actually becomes more active and.. awake: I notice this feeling of 'brain awakeness' especially when it's cloudy. I'd recommend it to anyone experiencing constant feelings of confusion, extreme tiredness and laziness, unsual improductivity specifically due to weather conditions like constant cloudy/rainy weather. A good idea woud be providing an adaptor when shipping to EU.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Giovanna Gerardi

customer_reviews.title: It really does help
customer_reviews.text: I hate the short days and gloomy mornings of winter. This light definitely helps boost my energy and mood. I have it on while I drink my morning coffee and I can feel the difference afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: dealzappealz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light. Small enough to move to where ever you wish to use it. Bright, uplifts my mood.
customer_reviews.author: Ann White

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, shipped on time and intact. After only 3 days, I feel an improvement in my mood and energy level. My only bit of criticism is that the lamp is not always stable, even on a flat surface, depending on where the stand is clipped to the edge and sometimes this does not allow me to set it at the angle I want. That being said, I still wish I would have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light therapy device
customer_reviews.text: My wife is using the lamp to treat her Seasonal Affective Disorder. It is very easy to use, and she is happy about this purchase. The lamp is of excellent quality, is exactly as described by the seller, and it was received very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Misleading  packaging but effective brightmess.
